text: passing alongside one of them , d’artagnan fancied he perceived on board it the woman of meung -- the same whom the unknown gentleman had called milady , and whom d’artagnan had thought so handsome ; but thanks to the current of the stream and a fair wind , his vessel passed so quickly that he had little more than a glimpse of her .
